fact.original: 木莎卡(希腊语: μουσακάς Mousakas;土耳其语:musakka)又譯茄子肉醬千層批、希臘茄盒。
fact.translated: Moussaka (Greek: μουσακάς Mousakas; Turkish: musakka) is also translated as eggplant meat sauce lasagna or Greek eggplant casserole.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 木莎卡(希腊语: μουσακάς Mousakas;土耳其语:musakka),又譯茄子肉醬千層批、希臘茄盒,主要使用炒茄子与番茄或櫛瓜,通常會加入碎肉。流行于巴尔干地区、中东等地。最知名的木莎卡为希腊木莎卡。

src_context: 木莎卡(希腊语: μουσακάς Mousakas;土耳其语:musakka)又譯茄子肉醬千層批、希臘茄盒。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: It may be served cold as a mezze dish, or hot.
The Egyptian version of moussaka is made from layers of fried eggplant immersed in tomato sauce and then baked.
There are also variants with zucchini (courgettes, kabak musakka), carrots (havuç musakka) and potatoes (patates musakka).
There are also variants with zucchini (courgettes, kabak musakka), carrots (havuç musakka) and potatoes (patates musakka).

fact.original: 最知名的木莎卡为希腊木莎卡。
fact.translated: The most famous moussaka is Greek moussaka.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 木莎卡(希腊语: μουσακάς Mousakas;土耳其语:musakka),又譯茄子肉醬千層批、希臘茄盒,主要使用炒茄子与番茄或櫛瓜,通常會加入碎肉。流行于巴尔干地区、中东等地。最知名的木莎卡为希腊木莎卡。

src_context: 木莎卡通常會加入碎肉。
木莎卡流行于巴尔干地区、中东等地。
最知名的木莎卡为希腊木莎卡。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: The Greek version includes layers of meat and eggplant topped with a béchamel ("white") sauce and baked.
The Greek version includes layers of meat and eggplant topped with a béchamel ("white") sauce and baked.
In Egypt, messa'aa can be made vegan  or vegetarian as well as with meat; in all cases, the main ingredient is the fried eggplant.
In Egypt, messa'aa can be made vegan  or vegetarian as well as with meat; in all cases, the main ingredient is the fried eggplant.
